body_text: This isn't actually using state anywhere, as far as I can see. We probably don't want to @connect things that don't read from Redux. I would expect things like isEnabled and isPaused to be calculated in render, since they are derived from this component's props.
body: This isn't actually using `state` anywhere, as far as I can see. We probably don't want to `@connect` things that don't read from Redux. I would expect things like `isEnabled` and `isPaused` to be calculated in `render`, since they are derived from this component's props.
body_html: This isn't actually using state anywhere, as far as I can see. We probably don't want to @connect things that don't read from Redux. I would expect things like isEnabled and isPaused to be calculated in render, since they are derived from this component's props.
